headline: Jim Cramer Sees Oracle (ORCL) as Inexpensive: “Stock’s Been Hurt but Has Value”

headline: Oracle (ORCL) Outpaces Stock Market Gains: What You Should Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Oracle (ORCL) stood at $138.56, denoting a +0.76% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Should You Invest in Oracle (ORCL) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Oracle (ORCL) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: North York General Becomes First Hospital in Canada to Migrate EHR to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
summary: North York General Hospital (NYGH) in Toronto, Canada, has improved the performance and usability of its Oracle Health Foundation electronic health record (EHR) by migrating it to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). With OCI, NYGH is able to offer a better experience for its patients and providers and enable a more agile approach to adopting new technologies like generative AI.
